Articles.Content:
In the past engine sound always faded with distance as the camera moved back. Now it no longer fades and I never knew how jarring it is until I lost that feature. During burns or even launches in their cruise phase Id pan out to get a break from the sound and watch the vehicle streak though the sky. And especially with flying aircraft for long periods of time. I have to mute the game now. It sucks. Is there any word from Squad on if this is even getting fixed and returning?

Edited November 13, 2019 by Motokid600
